original_text: My little children, we should not show love for each other only by what we say. We should also show true love by the things that we do.
korean_text: 자녀들아 우리가 말과 혀로만 사랑하지 말고 행함과 진실함으로 하자

sentences.original_text: we should not show love for each other only by what we say
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 말로만 서로를 사랑해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: We should also show true love
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 또한 진정한 사랑을 보여야 합니다

sentences.original_text: by the things that we do
